pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Methods for Analysing Multivariate Abundance Data // A set of tools for displaying, modeling and analysing multivariate abundance data in community ecology. See 'mvabund- package.Rd' for details of overall package organization. The package is implemented with the Gnu Scientific Library (http://www.gnu.org/software/gsl/) and 'Rcpp' (http://dirk.eddelbuettel.com/code/rcpp.html) 'R' / 'C++' classes.
